author: alexoree
msg: JUDDI-602 - adding support for encrypted configuration values, only SMTP credentials are currently supported
JUDDI-628 - All authentication relate settings are now grouped. Several unreferenced Property entries were removed
JUDDI-629 - several of the crypto functions did not decrypt properly, fixed now. added conditional test for AES256 based on JCE installation

author: britter
msg: We've updated to Java 5 - the next release will definitely be a minor release
